amendatorysection.catchline: Department, juvenile services division, and commission; provide direct computer access.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The department shall provide the Public Counsel and the Inspector General with direct computer access to all computerized records, reports, and documents maintained by the department in connection with administration of the Nebraska child welfare system.

(2) The juvenile services division and the commission shall provide the Inspector General with direct computer access to all computerized records, reports, and documents maintained by the juvenile services division in connection with administration of juvenile justice services.
